meta.job_title: Specialist, Investment Analytics of Commercial Mortgage Loans

duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the development of a commercial mortgage loan (CML) portfolio surveillance and credit risk management framework.
Assist in the creation, review, development, design, and maintenance of presentations, dashboards, reporting, and other written materials for senior leadership, department, and platform updates.
Support reporting, presentations, dashboards, and other written materials related to CMLs for various internal and external committees and constituencies.
Collaborate with the Financial Reporting department on the monthly pricing of the entire mortgage loan portfolio.
Maintain knowledge of internal and external initiatives that influence the data governance and technology strategies of the CML team.
Lead efforts to document and enhance current business processes and lead special projects impacting CML business.
Serve as the lead Business Analyst for CML technology initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree or equivalent work experience in business, finance, technology, and/or real estate. Bachelor's degree recommended.
